availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1863-1867

body.p:
Head-Quarters Military Commander, Louisville.
Louisville, Ky., Dec 1 1863.

Orders
J. K. Edwards U. S. Detective will proceed to Frankfort Ky without delay and report to the Governor of Kentucky, write sealed dispatches from Brig Genl Boyle Cmdg Dist Ky & 1st Division 23 A. C.
The Q. M. Department will furnish transportation.

By order of
Col M Mundy
C. C. Adams
1st Lieut 14 Ohio Vols
& A, A, A, G
